info.description: Deals with Remote Sessions, Access Management (Access Control Groups), and System Management (Network Devices and Assets) APIs
info.title: Secure Equipment Access (SEA) Management APIs

get.description:
Get list of Access Control Groups
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: The number of pages to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default: 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The numbers of items to return on a page. Default: 500
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Available (multiple) options: [name]
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Available options: [name]
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Available options: [ASC, DESC] Default: ASC
parameters.name: sort_dir

200.description: Successful operation. Access Control Groups received.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

post.description:
Create an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

201.description: Successful operation. Access Control Group created.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

get.description:
Get available remote access access control groups
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA User
- SEA System Admin

parameters.description: The number of pages to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default: 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The numbers of items to return on a page. Default: 500
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Available (multiple) options: [name, app_id]
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Available options: [name, app_id]
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Available options: [ASC, DESC] Default: ASC
parameters.name: sort_dir

200.description: Successful operation. Remote Access Control Groups received.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

get.description:
Get list of Users that can be added to an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: The number of pages to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default: 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The numbers of items to return on a page. Default: 500
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Available (multiple) options: [username]
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Available options: [username]
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Available options: [ASC, DESC] Default: ASC
parameters.name: sort_dir

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

delete.description:
Delete an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group to delete
parameters.name: group_id

200.description: Successful operation. Access Control Group has been deleted.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

delete.summary: Delete an Access Control Group by Id

get.description:
Get Access Control Group details by id
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin
- SEA User

parameters.description: ID of the access control group to return
parameters.name: group_id

200.description: Successful operation. Access Control Group received.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

get.summary: Get Access Control Group by Id

put.description:
Update an Access Control Group name, description, or enabled/disabled status
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group to delete
parameters.name: group_id

200.description: Successful operation. Access Control Group has been updated

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

put.summary: Update Access Control Group by Id

post.description:
Add an Access Method to an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group
parameters.name: group_id

201.description: Successful operation. Access Method has been added to access control group.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

post.summary: Add Access Method to Access Control Group

post.description:
Add a User to an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group
parameters.name: group_id

201.description: Successful operation. User has been added to the access control group.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

post.summary: Add User to Access Control Group

post.description:
Add Users to an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group
parameters.name: group_id

201.description: Successful operation. Users have been added to the access control group.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

post.summary: Add Users to Access Control Group

post.description:
Add Access Methods to an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group
parameters.name: group_id

201.description: Successful operation. Access Methods have been added to the access control group.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

post.summary: Add Access Methods to Access Control Group

post.description:
Remove an Access method from an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group
parameters.name: group_id

201.description: Successful operation. Access method has been removed from access control group.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

post.summary: Remove Access method from an Access Control Group

post.description:
Remove a User from an Access Control Group
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: ID of the access control group
parameters.name: group_id

201.description: Successful operation. User has been removed from access control group.

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

post.summary: Remove User from Access Control Group

Get list of Network Devices
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin

parameters.description: The number of pages to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default: 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The numbers of items to return on a page. Default: 500

post.description:
Add a new Network Device
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin

parameters.description: Specifies whether or not to begin the sea agent installation onto the network device
parameters.name: install_sra_agent

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

Delete a Network Device by Id
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin

get.description:
Get list of closed or historical Remote Sessions
One of the below roles is needed to invoke this API
- SEA System Admin
- SEA Access Admin

parameters.description: The number of pages to skip before starting to collect the result set. Default: 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The numbers of items to return on a page. Default: 500
parameters.name: size

parameters.description: Available (multiple) options: [username, gateway_name, device_name, connection_name, connection_protocol]
parameters.name: filter

parameters.description: Available (multiple) options: [time_begin, time_end]
parameters.name: compare_filter

parameters.description: Available options: [username, gateway name, device name, connection name, connection type, bytes total]
parameters.name: sort_by

parameters.description: Available options: [ASC, DESC] Default: ASC
parameters.name: sort_dir

schema.example: Permission denied to access the resource

get.summary: Get list of closed or historical Remote Sessions
